text:
The womb of Odessa: the reconstruction of Novoshchepnoy row has risen to 165 million UAH

06 Nov 2019, 17:18

The governor of Odessa region Maxim Kutsy agreed on the design documentation for the overhaul of Novoshchepnoy Ryad, which Privoz has.
As follows from the decree of the head of the RSA, the reconstruction of this cesspool, reminiscent of the Mumbai slum today, will cost the budget of Odessa 164 million 946 thousand UAH. Regional administrations, by law, approve construction projects worth from 120 to 400 million UAH, if they are fully or partially financed from local budgets.



Kutsyi also recommended that the management of the road facilities of the Odessa City Council ensure compliance with the requirements of the Law of Ukraine ‚ÄúOn Environmental Impact Assessment‚Äù.
Earlier, the mayor's office of Odessa planned to spend UAH 50 million for the reconstruction of Novoshchepnoy, and they collected the money from the billions of dollars from the state-owned Ukrgasbank.
‚ÄúWe made an offer to the owners of Privoz, and they went to meet us. An interesting project for the reconstruction of the market has been developed, but we, for our part, will repair the street itself, ‚Äùsaid Odessa Mayor Gennady Trukhanov a year ago.
The movement along the Novoshchepny row will be two-way. Trading trays, which now go on tram tracks and interfere with the passage of cars, are deployed by counters inside the market.
Negotiations on "loyal pricing" were held with the owners of the parking lot under construction at the corner of the Water Supply and Novoshchepnoy Ryad. This, Gennady Trukhanov is sure, will allow unloading the street from parked cars.
